steps.description: This will allow employees to make back-dated time entries.
steps.label: Allow Backdated Entries
steps.title: Backdated Entries

steps.description: This will prevent employees from making backdated entries earlier than a specified number of days. For example, if the value is set to 1, entries before Today - 1 day will be restricted.
steps.label: Allow Backdated Entries Till (Employee)
steps.title: Allowed Till( For Employee )

steps.description: This will prevent manager from making backdated entries earlier than a specified number of days for empoloyees reporting to them. For example, if the value is set to 1, entries before Today - 1 day will be restricted.
steps.label: Allow Backdated Entries Till (Manager)
steps.title: Allowed Till( For Manager )

steps.description: This will allow employees to make future time entries.
steps.label: Allow Future Entries
steps.title: Future Entries

steps.description: In this section you can setup various reminder for employees related to the timesheets.
steps.label: Reminder Settings
steps.title: Reminders
